me.ashtheking.island

Class Module

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.ashtheking.island.Module
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ModuleHeight, ModuleMoisture, ModuleSea, ModuleTemp

    public abstract class Module
extends java.lang.Object
    The abstract class Module is key to IslandGen. Without Modules, all the program would do is render an elevation map using a gradient.
    Author:
    Ashwin

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected double[][] calc
      A protected double[][] available for usage by modules.

      • calculate

        public void calculate(double[][] heightmap,
             boolean[][] watermap)
        An overridable method for running calculations, usually placing values inside calc.
        Parameters:
        heightmap - The elevation map passed on from IslandGen
        watermap - The water map passed on from IslandGen

      • getColors

        public abstract java.awt.Color[][] getColors(double[][] heightmap,
                           boolean[][] watermap)
        The method to return the Color matrix for the world, based on the heightmap and watermap.
        Parameters:
        heightmap - The elevation map passed on from IslandGen
        watermap - The water map passed on from IslandGen
        Returns:

      • getNearbyRegions

        protected java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object[]> getNearbyRegions(double[][] array,
                                                       int x,
                                                       int y,
                                                       int d)
        A method returning an arraylist of arrays, which gets all the tiles a certain radius away.
        Parameters:
        array - The array to tile through
        x - The starting X value to find tiles away from
        y - The starting Y value to find tiles away from
        d - The number of tiles away to get blocks from
        Returns:
        An arraylist of arrays in the form Object[] { x-coordinate, y-coordinate, value }

        ToString method used in ModuleLoader's GUI.
